column4: hey everyone - does anyone know how to get the Atheros AR5007EG AR5BXB63 to work in ubuntu
has anyone ever messed with this wifi card?
odd thing is 8.10 shows the driver but it fails to work
strange
I just had to get my atheros working
how did ya do it
how did you do it
disable the atheros driver in the hardware thingy, install a backports-modules package (not ure of the exact name), reboot
that worked for me; I'm on a Jaunty alpha but the forum post I read suggesting it was for intrepid
do you have a link to a tutorial
sec
thx
here's here I got it from: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1026770
basically, you need to install linux-backports-modules-[your version] from Synaptic
thanks
which model card do you have
mine is the AR242x in that thread
yours is different, but since the driver you switch to from that process is called "ath5k" I thought it might help you
Atheros AR5007EG AR5BXB63 <-- thats mine
i will give it a shoot - anything to get it working :)
good luck!
